passages.text:
Alright... What was I do again? Right. Looking for the library.
[[Continue -> Library]]
passages.name: Init

passages.text:
Finally found the library. It's... definitely impressive. Mr Crain seemed to have had a very large Shakespeare collection...


[[Continue -> Correct lever pull]]
passages.name: Library

passages.text:
What was that?

[[Continue -> Pick up of journal entry]]
passages.name: Correct lever pull

passages.text: Weird. Looks like it's a diary entry written by Hugh's... first wife? I think? I'll put it in my backpack if I want to look at it later.
passages.name: Pick up of journal entry
